name: Under, Ground & Jam!
description:
This is a re upload of my original 2015 game for the scirra underground game jam.
The plan was to add some exstra fuerters and clean the code the make it opensource but the original file is lost and only a old built remain.

OG way to play it: https://gamejolt.com/games/under-ground-jam/122776

original text but with less spelling mistakes:

Please note that I also made all of the art my self.
You play as Under, ground and Jam!
But Jam has fallen in a well.
Now Under and Ground are also in the well Play as Jam and try to get as high as you can
This game has a leaderboard(sike), touch and controller support! #platformer
